items.title: Annoucing FluxStore 3.3
items.summary: Hi friends, InspireUI here with a big bag of improvement in the latest FluxStore release. First of all, we could…
items.content_html:
Hi friends, InspireUI here with a big bag of improvement in the latest FluxStore release.

First of all, we could like to thank you for putting your trust in our FluxStore product and the InspireUI. Weâ€™re here to help you get your business better optimized and excited to do our part in maintaining and upgrading the product to be more powerful, flexible, and high-performance.

What news in FluxStore v3.3 ?

The release inlcude 148 merge request include a lot of new feature and important improvement.

New features

â‡ï¸ New 2x performance improvement.
â‡ï¸ Easy & simply upgrade - see changelog
â‡ï¸ New TabMenu & Scrollable layout - see video
â‡ï¸ New Smart Engagement Banner - see video
â‡ï¸ Vertical Product Gallery - see video
â‡ï¸ Show SMS Login scree by Default.
â‡ï¸ Upgrade Category layout
â‡ï¸ Upgrade Product Detail themes.
â‡ï¸ New Phone Number Config.
â‡ï¸ Youtube video in Product Detail
â‡ï¸ New Languages: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ Azerbaijan, Urdu

Important improvements

â¡ï¸ Compatible with latest Flutter 3.3.x.
â¡ï¸ Limit Login Attempts Reloaded.
â¡ï¸ Cart icon for LTR and RTL
â¡ï¸ Support Android 13.
â¡ï¸ Ability to add Notes with Link on Order.
â¡ï¸ Upgrade all pubspec Libraries to latest.
â¡ï¸ Fix TikTok videos not load.
â¡ï¸ Fix video on TikTok that are stretched.
â¡ï¸ Fix general web item not update when login.
â¡ï¸ Fix multi language for brands.
â¡ï¸ Fix category product list.
â¡ï¸ Fix cannot update menu label.
â¡ï¸ Fix stuck at empty splash screen when isCaching config not loaded
â¡ï¸ Fix tap payment issue
â¡ï¸ Fix wrong shipping fee
â¡ï¸ Fix: max allow quantity when add product
â¡ï¸ Fix choose time of booking don't appear
â¡ï¸ Fix the app does not request permission push notification
â¡ï¸ Fix wrong currency in paystack payment
â¡ï¸ Fix total cart for subscription
â¡ï¸ Fix: click text story
â¡ï¸ Fix login for webview
â¡ï¸ Fix point redemption when create order
â¡ï¸ Fix defaultCurrency symbol in textField when editing product
â¡ï¸ Fix vertical layout column with filter UI
â¡ï¸ Fix missing author data of blog
â¡ï¸ Fix minor bugs in sms login
â¡ï¸ Fix AutoUpdate

Â 

Â 

Â 

Â 

Â 

Â

items.title: Announcing FluxBuilder 1.5.x
items.summary: Proceed with the big success of the FluxBuilder version 1.4.x, InspireUI is constantly working hard to upgrade the drag and…
items.content_html:
Proceed with the big success of the FluxBuilder version 1.4.x, InspireUI is constantly working hard to upgrade the drag and dropÂ FluxBuilderÂ tool. And nowÂ FluxBuilder version 1.5.xÂ finally is published with more functionalities.

Try NowÂ â€” theÂ latest FluxBuilder.

Whatâ€™s new in FluxBuilder 1.5.x

FluxBuilder 1.5.1:
---
(1) GDPR & Account Deletion ğŸ†
(2) App Performance â­ï¸
(3) Tera Wallet ğŸ§§
(4) WooCommerce Appointments ğŸ“†
(5) MyFatoorah Payment ğŸ’°
(6) PayTM Payment ğŸ’°
(7) Tap Payment ğŸ’µ
(8) Search Product ğŸ”
(9) Cloud Config ğŸŒ¨ï¸FluxBuilder 1.5.0:
---
(10) Publish ğŸ–Œ
(11) Test APK & iOS ğŸ“²
(12) BigCommerce Platform ğŸ…±ï¸
(13) Webview+Token Feature ğŸŒˆ
(14) Product List's UIs ğŸ’¦Important Improvement:
---
+ Build On Cloud ğŸš€ {download, integration configs, copy log}
+ Homepage ğŸ¡ {Geo search, Tag, Banner Image-Horizontal, TikTok} 
+ Category ğŸ§° {Hide Empty Categories, Remap Categories}
+ Parallax Effect ğŸŒ 
+ Always Show AppBar â­ï¸
+ TabBar on Top ğŸŒ‡
+ Google Map ğŸ—º
+ Subscription ğŸŒNote: The detailed explaination is also updated via Changelog page.
Â 

(1) GDPR Compliance ğŸ†

As theÂ new requirementÂ from the Apple Store, when submitting new apps and app updates, they must include the Account DeletionÂ starting June 30, 2022, which let users initiate deletion of their account within the app to protect their data privacy.

Understand that, after developing this new feature forÂ FluxStore Apps, InspireUI has quickly added it to FluxBuilder â€”Â GDPR ComplianceÂ to support all users usingÂ FluxStore Apps.

GDPR ComplianceÂ feature provides both theÂ Account DeletionÂ option and the ability to show theÂ Privacy PoliciesÂ for the first time opening the app, which following theÂ GDPR complianceÂ affects all companies that do business in the EU, as the image below.

Now users can confidently publish their apps on Apple Store. Also, InspireUI can confidently provide the frequently updatedÂ FluxStore AppsÂ and FluxBuilder, saving hours of app development effort.

Â 

(2) App Performance âš¡ï¸

App Performance feature has been available onÂ FluxBuilder 1.5.1Â to take your app performance to a higher level. You are able to enable theÂ HTTP CacheÂ to save the performance and the repeat network request that will help the app load faster with the detailed guide attached.

The original product images usually cause slow app loading that we really do not want.Â Image OptimizationÂ helps to improve performance by enabling the loading of compressed thumbnails instead of original images. No more the app does not show product images.

Â 

(3) Tera Wallet ğŸ§§

FluxBuilder is becoming more and more varied in supported Features and Design. In version 1.5.1, the Terra Wallet will be the next feature added. Users can find it in theÂ Checkout & PaymentÂ ofÂ Features.

Actually, the Tera Wallet is familiar with users who are owning theÂ FluxStore Woocommerce,Â FluxStore Multi-Vendor, orÂ FluxStore ProÂ (Woocommerce) app.

Users just need to install and activate theÂ Tera WalletÂ on their websites. After that, go to the Profile tab and enable Tera Wallet inÂ General Settings. The feature will display after successful login.

Â 

(4) WooCommerce Appointments ğŸ“†

This would be the strangest new feature of FluxBuilder. Because the feature has been available for FluxStore Apps for a long time ago and why is it included in FluxBuilder until version 1.5.1?

In previous times, FluxBuilder focuses more on Design and complex Features to make it easier when creating apps. At the present, FluxBuilder is gradually developing more for all features to produce convenience and shorter the time of setting up the app.

For theÂ WooCommerce Appointments, users can set the maximum booking date limit, by enablingÂ Advance Booking LimitÂ and adjusting the limit variable. If users do not set a value for it, the booking feature will not limit the time that an appointment can be booked.

Â 

(5) MyFatoorah Payment ğŸ’°

The developerâ€™s group at InspireUI has just implemented thisÂ MyFatoorah paymentÂ on the latestÂ FluxStoreÂ 3.0.2 apps. And simultaneously support to enable this payment on the drag and drop FluxBuidler tool for users to easily configure.

(6) Tap Payment ğŸ’µ

Following the familiar payment features in FluxBuilder in previous versions, the new checkout payment has been implemented â€” Tap Payment.

There is a selection to enable or disable the payments. Besides, obviously, users can set up the Payment on FluxBuilder easily by inputting the feature config information. For example, users need to submit theÂ Secret KeyÂ andÂ Payment Method IDÂ to make the Tap Payment work on the app after enabling.

(7) PayTM Payment ğŸ’°

In addition, weâ€™ve also added the PayTM payment.Â PayTM Payment GatewayÂ should be installed on the website first. Then, in FluxBuilder, just input theÂ Payment Method IDÂ andÂ Merchant IdentifierÂ to configure this payment.

Â 

(8) Search Product ğŸ”

Users often search using precise product identifiers, such as stock keeping units (SKU), that vendors set and use to track the movement of their inventory. Searching by SKU makes it easier for users to find the product theyâ€™re looking for.

This effectiveÂ Search ProductÂ feature provides the ability to enable or disable the SKU search or the ultimate WordPress search engineÂ Ajax Search Pro, which is available for WooCommerce.

Â 

(9) Cloud Config ğŸŒ¨

TheÂ Cloud ConfigÂ feature will join to supportÂ updating the app DesignÂ without re-publishing to Apple Store and Google Play by simple steps:

1ï¸âƒ£ SimplyÂ createÂ an account on any Cloud Server.
2ï¸âƒ£ ThenÂ uploadÂ the config JSON files to the Cloud ServerÂ (which is the app Design that you would like to update. You can use theÂ ExportÂ feature to export the Design config JSON files).
3ï¸âƒ£Â CopyÂ a URL link (example:Â https://yourname.vercel.app/config_en.json) andÂ inputÂ it to Cloud Config as the image below:

Of course, users ofÂ FluxStore WooCommerce,Â FluxStore Multi Vendors,Â FluxStore ProÂ (WooCommerce only), andÂ FluxNewsÂ apps haveÂ two flexible waysÂ to update Design without re-publishing:
1ï¸âƒ£ Use thisÂ Cloud ConfigÂ feature. Remember toÂ turn offÂ the MStore-API Caching on App Performance.
2ï¸âƒ£ Or upload the config JSON files toÂ MStore APIÂ plugin in their websites easilyÂ (no need to use this Cloud Config feature). Just remember toÂ enableÂ the MStore-API Caching.

Â 

(10) Publish ğŸ–Œ

In addition to the Cloud Config above, this Publish feature could be seen as one of the signatures of FluxBuilder because of its amazing benefit to users.

One thing we love about FluxBuilder is that it does not just update the app Design â€” it also updates both theÂ Design and FeaturesÂ of apps without re-publishing to App Stores by clicking the greenÂ PublishÂ button as in the image below:

The Cloud Config feature helps users configure the cloud information for the first time. After publishing the app to App Stores, sometimes they need to update theÂ DesignÂ of apps without re-publishing to App Stores. Instead of uploading the config JSON files to the Cloud Server or MStore API plugin on their websites, users are able to do itÂ directlyÂ from the FluxBuilder tool via theÂ PublishÂ feature.

Â 

(11) Test APK & iOS ğŸ“²

Immediately experience the app designed by yourself on real devicesÂ in 1 minute.

This sounds crazy but itâ€™s true. Now, all users (even presale customers) can easily see how their app looks on their phones after designed byÂ FluxBuilder.

Because of framework limitations, the simulator onÂ FluxBuilderÂ is not able to display some design items on FluxBuilderÂ (such as TikTok videos, Html, etc.). To quickly solve the problem, InspireUI has provided theÂ Test APKÂ andÂ Test iOSÂ to help users test their app DESIGN on Android PhonesÂ (and the file is for testing purposes only so publishing is impossible).

ğŸš¨ However, please notice that there are stillÂ some features requiring additional configuration, such asÂ Map, Social Login, Push Notifications, Dynamic Link, Realtime Chat, Ads. So if theyÂ do not work, it is properly because they need to be set as the corresponding manual tutorial to work well on the app, and someÂ FluxStore appsÂ need to install the integration API.

Â 

(12) BigCommerce Platform ğŸ…±ï¸

Together with the launching of theÂ FluxStore BigCommerceÂ app, FluxBuilder now supports BigCommerce as it has been doing with the other FluxStore apps. Users can create, design, and customize the BigCommerce app and build the app by FluxBuilder.

Â 

(13) Webview+Token Feature ğŸŒˆ

â€œI want every user to be logged in to the App and the Webview sections of same website in the App also at the App Login itself.â€ â€” a user suggested.

InspireUI and users sometimes will be on the same wavelength accidentally. Because of that, the Webview & Token feature which was identified as â€œa must-have featureâ€ and â€œan amazing featureâ€ was quickly added to FluxBuilder to support users.

After logging into the App, it is no longer necessary to re-login to access the Webview Page. Currently, the feature is supported on 3 main screens: Settings, Side menu, and TabBar.

Especially, users can use Javascript to hide some webview UI on the app.

Â 

(14) Product List ğŸ’¦

The Product List feature in this new version of FluxBuilder has been upgraded with more functionalities. Now there are 3 UIs on the Product List screen which users can choose to show Images or only Title.

The bottom-corner Cart icon is also able to be enabled or hidden on the Product List screen.

Â 

Important Improvements

There are many powerful improvements on the FluxBuidler 1.5.x, such as:

ğŸš€Â Build On Cloud: the newÂ Integration ConfigsÂ feature lets users know which configuration they have done or not. Or theÂ Copy LogÂ button helps users to copy and send to our technical team to more easily investigate the issue you encountered. Additionally,Â downloadÂ the Keystore, Certificate, and Provisioning files which are created automatically from the drag&drop FluxBuilder.

ğŸ¡ On theÂ Homepage, a bunch of features are included according to the requirements of users to provide a good experience:

  • Banner Image: provideÂ HorizontalÂ type, you can add a multi-image banner as horizontal with support for smooth scrolling.
  • Geo Search
  • Support users toÂ selectÂ TagÂ after choosing a Category onÂ Product HorizontalÂ orÂ Banner ImageÂ items.
  • TikTokÂ videos widget ğŸ¸: Responding to the high inquiry about adding TikTok videos to the app, FluxBuilder instantly launches the new Widget for the Home page â€” TikTok Videos Widget. The feature does not require many steps to show up a range of videos on your TikTok channel â€” just input the TikTok account name. Itâ€™s DONE!

ğŸ§° On theÂ CategoryÂ screen, many clients would like to display Categories that do not have any products, while others do not like to show them. So we add theÂ Hide Empty CategoryÂ feature to the Category tab for flexible configuration.

Besides that, some request that FluxBuilder should support Categories Remap to help them define a new multi-category tree that is different from the backend site.

WithÂ Category Remap, users can control the Location, Order, and Level of the Category.

It is very useful for theÂ Shopify appÂ whose categories do not have multi-level!

  • Other features such as Parallax Effect, TabBar on Top, always show AppBar,Â Google Map,Â SubscriptionÂ to extend your expired Technical Support time, etc.
Â 

Your feedbacks are welcome â¤ï¸

Letâ€™s be a part ofÂ FluxBuilderÂ âœˆï¸ develop your creativity âœˆï¸

InspireUI gives FluxBuilder the first steps, but the outstanding success of this drag and drop tool has been built from the suggestions and recommendations of consumers.

Basically, most of the fundamental features of a mobile app are consisted in this tool. You are able to easily create your own app with FluxBuilder in a short time.

However, FluxBuilder is more than that. We highly appreciate all of your cooperation ideas and we are working every day to constantly improve and innovate it to give you the flexibility to take full advantage of this drag&drop tool.

Thank you for your support ofÂ FluxBuilderÂ tool andÂ FluxStore AppsÂ â¤ï¸ Welcome toÂ FluxBuilder 1.5!

items.title: How to create Apps using FluxBuider?
items.summary: Hello again from InspireUI team!ğŸ‘‹ This is the guide for new users to use theÂ latest Drag&drop FluxBuilder 1.2.3 This drag&drop…
items.content_html:
Hello again from InspireUI team!ğŸ‘‹ This is the guide for new users to use theÂ latest Drag&drop FluxBuilder 1.2.3

This drag&drop tool is compatible with allÂ FluxStore appsÂ (exceptÂ FluxStore ManagerÂ andÂ FluxStore Delivery Boy). We will keep the blog post as short as possible. Letâ€™s goğŸ„â€â™€ï¸

There are 6 stepsÂ to useÂ FluxBuilderÂ for your Website:
1. Download and InstallÂ FluxBuilder
2. Sign Up, then Login
3. Integrate with your website
4. Customize the Design
5. Customize the Features
6. Build your app (APK, IPA)
Others
ğŸ’Â InspireUIÂ Youtube

Â 

1. Download and InstallğŸ“¦

Click here forÂ Video guide.

Download the latest FluxBuilderÂ here. It is available for Windows and macOS.
To install on MacOS successfully,Â Right-clickÂ on FluxBuilder.pkg > selectÂ OpenÂ >Â OpenÂ again. Itâ€™ll work!

2. Sign Up, then Loginâœ¨

Click here forÂ Video guide.

After launching FluxBuilder, sign up a new account and login:
SelectÂ LoginÂ >Â Sign Up:

  • Input your name, email, and new password, then selectÂ Sign UpÂ button.
  • Check your mailbox for the activation email, activate it. Then login to FluxBuilder.

Solve Issue: IfÂ nothing displays when youâ€™re typing, please change to English keyboard (typing in English).

3. Integrate with your Websiteâš¡ï¸

Click here forÂ Video guide.

Follow 3 simple steps:

  1. Select DASHBOARD, thenÂ Create New App

2. Input your Website URL, and keys (if any), then clickÂ Run Troubleshoot

  • Make sure you inputÂ httpsÂ instead of http.
  • Make sure you doÂ not input sub-folder domainÂ like thisÂ https://yaari.store/pk-enÂ because it causes Rest API issue. Please change to subdomain or main domain.

3. Select a template

4. Customize the Designâ­ï¸

Click here forÂ Video guide.

If youÂ can not drag&dropÂ the elements on theÂ right panel,Â press & holdÂ inÂ 2â€“3 secondsÂ then drag & drop.
You also can drag&dropÂ TabsÂ on the left menu.

Check theÂ CheckListÂ for detail.

5. Customize the Featuresâœ¨

Click here forÂ Video guide.

Precondition: Activate with your purchase code ofÂ FluxStore or FluxNewsÂ apps (regular or extended licenses).

Check theÂ CheckListÂ for the detailed features.

6. Build your app (APK, IPA)ğŸš€

Click here forÂ Video guide.

Precondition: Activate with your Extended license ofÂ FluxStoreÂ apps.

  • With regular license, you can build your app with Android studio and Flutter with this guideÂ https://support.inspireui.com/
  • With extended license, useÂ this guideÂ after purchase.

OthersğŸ‘

1. Importâœ¨

Click here forÂ Video guide.

In case you already had your ownÂ .jsonÂ orÂ env.dartÂ file (in source code ofÂ FluxStoreÂ apps). And now you would like to change the app Design or Features. Just import it into the FluxBuilder tool to continue customization.

  • Import the Design: refer toÂ Import Config DESIGN, openÂ .jsonÂ file (it usually is theÂ lib/config/config_en.jsonÂ file in your FluxStore source code).
  • Import the Features: refer toÂ Import Config ENV, open theÂ lib/env.dartÂ file.

2. ExportğŸ„â€â™€ï¸

Click here forÂ Video guide.

  • After designing your app via the FluxBuilder tool, you will export the customized design and feature files and save them to your FluxStore/FluxNews source code.
  • On MacOS, it supports the short-cut to copy the JSON Design content to Clipboard by pressingÂ Command âŒ˜ + C
  • Precondition: Activate with your purchase code ofÂ FluxStore or FluxNewsÂ apps (regular or extended licenses).

3. Update Design without re-Publishingâ­ï¸

You are able to update Design without re-publishing to AppStore/Google Play. FollowÂ this guideÂ after purchase.

4. Dark & Light themesğŸ“²

Click here forÂ Video guide.

  • Dark theme of App:
  • Dark theme of FluxBuilder:

5. Discover our Appsâœ¨

More information about theÂ FluxStore or FluxNewsÂ apps.

InspireUI YoutubeğŸ“€

Feel free to subscribeÂ to ourÂ InspireUIÂ channel and press the bell icon to get notifications about new videos.

We are releasingÂ a series of FluxBuilder videosÂ to help users being familiar and easier in using this Drag&drop FluxBuilder toolğŸ™‚

Preview all of our FluxStore applications:

Preview our Showcase videosÂ and more:

Thank you so much and we look forward to serving you!

items.title: Announcing FluxStore 2.5.x
items.summary: New Powerful features are ready for downloading ğŸŠ New Features: --- (1) New Design Horizontal Product Layoutâš¡ï¸ (2) Barcode &…
items.content_html:
New Powerful features are ready for downloading ğŸŠ

Whatâ€™s new in FluxStore App 2.5.3

New Features:
---
(1) New Design Horizontal Product Layoutâš¡ï¸
(2) Barcode & QR code ScannerğŸ“²
(3) New Drawer Menu LayoutğŸŒˆ
(4) New Basic Layout Widgets (Button, Space...)â­
(5) New PayTM PaymentğŸ’°
(6) Re-OrderğŸ’«
(7) New Languages: SwedishğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª, FinlandğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®, GreekğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·, KhmerğŸ‡°ğŸ‡­, Marathi, KannadağŸ‡®ğŸ‡³Important Improvement:
---
+ Compatible with latest Flutter 2.5.3 (Channel Stable)
+ Update all pubspec library to latest version
+ Support config for old and new SmartChat layout
+ Update the SMS Login to support RTL
+ Shorten firebase dynamic link
+ Upgrade flutter_local_notification 9.0.2
+ Disable the bottom cart in My WishList screen
+ Disable bottom bar when navigating to Webview Payment
+ Fetch Blog by Tag
+ Upgrade MStore API to support OneSignal Notification
+ Apply app Rating Disable condition
+ Show Delivery Date in the Order History Detail screen
+ Tera Wallet: TopUp via WebviewNote: The detail explaination is also update via Changelog page.

(1) New Design Horizontal Product Layoutâš¡ï¸

Products layout is Pixel-perfect design on different types of layout screens, we have upgraded it more flexible to adapt from simple to complexity features.

  • Support Background Image to display the impressive promotion banner 1ï¸âƒ£
  • Support the Multi Colors Background with flexible Size Adjustment 2ï¸âƒ£
  • The Product List could be configured by the primary color 3ï¸âƒ£
  • NewÂ FluxStore appsÂ are compatible very well with the newÂ drag&drop FluxBuilder toolÂ that helps to customize the app with super easy steps. No worries, you will not require the programming skills to do these fancy UIs.
  • Easy to design the Banner & all the detailed properties viaÂ FluxBuilderÂ 4ï¸âƒ£
  • Easy to control the Shadow of Product Card, also the Spacing, Marginâ€¦5ï¸âƒ£
  • Support multiRow with multiColumn, easy to control the grid Ratio 6ï¸âƒ£
Â 

(2) Barcode & QR code Scanner âš¡ï¸

  • Support formats: EAN 8, EAN 13, UPC A, CODE 39, CODE 93, CODE 128, CODABAR, QRCODE.
  • Support Product/Order Info.
  • Required Plugins:Â YITH WOOCOMMERCE BARCODES AND QR CODES, or any plugins that generate Barcodes and QR codes.
  • Demo video:
Â 

(3) New Drawer Menu Layout ğŸŒˆ

  • Ability to manage the list of Dynamic Menu items 1ï¸âƒ£
  • Be able to customize many Design Styles. It could change the Angle, Radius, or the Position of the menu 2ï¸âƒ£
  • Changing the Background, Text Color, Icon Color, or you are able to even apply the Background Filter from Flutter 3ï¸âƒ£
Â 

(4) New Basic Layout Widgetsâ­

  • We also upgrade some Basic Widgets that are missing from the previous version: Buttons, Divider and Spacer.
  • The Button Types could display as multi-Touchable with the different Actions. For example: adding a list of Social Button Icons.
Â 

(5) PayTM PaymentğŸ’°

  • As some clients requested: â€œPayTM payment gateway is more popular in India because its UPI and Rupay Debit Card Transaction Commission is 0% lowestâ€, etc.
  • We also listen to this request and upgrade this native feature under a Regular License source code.
  • If you have any further requests, please donâ€™t forget to submit on this linkÂ https://new.inspireui.com

(6) Re-OrderğŸ’«

  • Users can order again by using the Re-Order button in the Order History.
  • Demo video:
Â 

(7) New LanguagesğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª

  • There are 6 new native languages supported: Swedish ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª, Finland ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®, Greek ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·, Khmer ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡­, Marathi ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³, Kannada ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³
  • Thank you to the great FluxStore community to contribute these languages so that FluxStore could supportÂ +30 languagesÂ so far â¤ï¸

(8) New Serverless Notion AppğŸŠ

  • Our team has released the newbornÂ FluxStore NotionÂ to the ecosystem of FluxStore apps. This is a new product that supports a Small Business for whom has an online store but would like to use theÂ NotionÂ to manage the Product data.
  • We will update another guideline to introduce this product later. For more information please check out this link:

FluxStore Notion - Serverless Flutter App for Notion

Version: 1.0.1 - support new Flutter 2.5.x - Last update:22 Nov 2021 â€‹- Changelog, Youtube - Files Included: Fullâ€¦

1.envato.market

Â 
Â 

Last month,Â InspireUIÂ has become theÂ Power Elite AuthorÂ (level 12). We truly thank our Customers who have contributed and supported us. We could not reach this achievement without all your support.

Also, thank the Team has been working hard to upgrade the products every day to keep the apps more stable and have rich functionalities.

items.title: InspireUI Interview
items.summary: Where do you live and work from? What is it like being a creator in your city? Our InspireUI team…
items.content_html:
Where do you live and work from? What is it like being a creator in your city?

Our InspireUI team is from Vietnam and Australia. We have meeting online almost everyday. We would love to create a continuous and consistent development environment by sharing techniques, customers caring and living knowledge. Besides, nurturing each member's mental health also plays a key role in our company culture. Everyone always enjoys, makes fun and behaves as a genuine Big Family.

Many clients already have their own existing websites, and they need the applications on both iOS and Android devices to take their online business to the next level. InspireUI create native mobile applications for clients' existing websites with impressive UI design and rich e-commerce functionalities. Our best sellers are FluxStore applications that synchronize with clients' websites instantly and vice versa. Various platforms of websites that we support to provide the applications are WooCommerce, WCMF, Dokan, Opencart, Magento, Shopify, WordPress, etc.

Moreover, there are some clients contacting us and sharing that they have no coding skills or just a little. Because of that, we have investigated and released the FluxBuilder (a Drag-and-drop tool) to customize easily the application design without re-publishing to App Stores. Weâ€™re working as hard as possible to give more and more benefits to our clients in an innovative way.

Tell us about the team behind you. How many people do you work with? Are you all based in the same location?

As above information, with a talented, enthusiastic, and active team, InspireUI is a reliable partner in mobile development. As a creator, especially the Power Elite Author, we believe that it requires more responsibility and work effort to help our clients find out great solutions for their problems.

Tell us about how you got started creating with Envato.

InspireUI has started with the first React Native MStore app on the market and we are so proud that we have been the first author submitting the React Native template and it've become the best selling React Native e-commerce at that time.

Also, the first time we posted video on InspireUI Youtube channel, we got a lot of positive feedback. At present, the channel have been improving constantly.

After that, we have increased the volume of Flutter applications which are now the success and best sellers of InspireUI - FluxStore applications, which create native mobile app for clients' website on both iOS and Android with impressive UI design and rich e-commerce functionalities and take clients online business to the next level.

What do you love about your work and why?

First of all, we always keep in mind that everything has yet to be done. Each product created on Envato, for the customers, is regular to one built from scratch. In our view, that attracts our customer a lot, and every suggestions and recommendations from our clients and developers extremely contributed to the current achievement.

Secondly, we feel happy because we can work in the flexible time, we can reach the balance between work and life, we can take a rest when we feel un-healthy, and then we come back to our tasks with a positive feelings, that generates more creativeness and passion. Last but not least, our clients are the ones who push us forward every day, and we highly appreciate that. Clients also are our coach/trainers with a pool of new, strange, and challenge fields. When our team solve and achieve them, we feel great, awesome! Clients are happy, we are happy. We also usually update the new and great technique trends that make our clients, you know, "Wow", surprise and exciting. These factors have motivated us a lot in producing a continuous development and improvement to make our products better and better as well as satisfy our clients.

What's the most challenging thing about your work?

You know that it is quite difficult to satisfy all customers. We do love our customers, and we love to bring the best experience while they are using our products. That's the reason why we always have to find some ways to improve our protocols in customer support, as well as enhance our product features. And you can see what they think of us is that we are willing to offer more and more benefits to customers, especially the free Drag-and-drop FluxBuilder tool.

What or who inspires you, or who is your favourite Envato Author?

In the olden days, we often think about WordPress users as developers. Now it's not anymore. With more and more merchants and self-employed individuals building up their sites, the applications and plugins should be made easy and straightforward. And our fellow author, Ninja Team, has been doing it very well.

Their FileBird - WordPress Media Library Folders plugin is a great example of a handy and user-friendly interface. With its drag and drop UI, every non-techie can easily "train" the WordPress media library to work for them at its best.

What's your most memorable client/customer story on Envato?

A client who left InspireUI an unforgettable memory was a young, passionate and ultra-friendly Indian customer, Mr. Hemil. We once met in 2019 before the Covid-19 pandemic spread out. He flew more than 3000 km just to meet us face-to-face and ask questions about our products and customizations. We had a really good time, and we very love his meaningful gift from India.

Another Korean customer, Mr. Kim came to InspireUI's office just to give us Korean grapes and ginseng. Many clients have given us fond memories and motivated us to work hard and more creatively. We respect all of our clients and are honored to serve them.

What is your advice to other Authors who want to be successful on Envato? What are the best lessons you have learned?

****As a great Indian Yoga master, Sadhguru said "Never think of who is doing better or worse than you. The only question is, are you doing your best." And do more meditation! Honestly, it will help everyone acquire more inspiration at work and boost up your productivity.

What are your hobbies and interests outside of work?

To balance between work, family, and health, we do spend time on the outdoor activities and fun stuff, such as jogging together, coffee-time for tech-talk, yoga, meditation, spend time with our family, play with the children, reading books, or board-game to relax. Sometimes we hold small marathon competitions, it's fun and memorable, gives us health, positive energy, creativity, and we do get along with each other very well.

Whatâ€™s next for your team?

With the mission of reducing thousands of hours of business spent on designing, developing, and testing a mobile application, InspireUI frequently provide more and more powerful features and maintain the stability of the mobile applications. Consequently, the clients and freelancers are able to optimize to deliver the applications to the market, to their clients with high productivity, cost-efficiency, rich e-commerce functionalities, impressive UX design, and smooth performance on both iOS and Android devices.

Thank you for reading. We look forward to serving or cooperating with you, please don't forget to subscribe the ğŸŒŸ InspireUI Youtube channel to get our latest video about Flutter products.

items.title: Announcing FluxBuilder 1.3.x
items.summary: - InspireUI here ğŸ™Œ, we are working hard to upgrade the drag and dropÂ FluxBuilderÂ tool to be more functionalities, in order…
items.content_html:
- InspireUI here ğŸ™Œ, we are working hard to upgrade the drag and dropÂ FluxBuilderÂ tool to be more functionalities, in order to support yourÂ FluxStoreÂ applications customization easier.
- Remember to use theÂ latest FluxBuilder.
- ğŸ‘‰ Subscribe our new Telegram ChannelÂ https://t.me/inspireui

Whatâ€™s new in Version 1.3.x ?

1. New AppBar â­ï¸
2. New TemplatesğŸ“±
3. New Side Menuâœ¨
4. New Settings ScreenğŸ€
5. New Product HorizontalğŸ’¥
6. Many ImprovementsğŸ’«

1. New App Bar â­ï¸

Similar to the bottom TabBar that we have updated on version 1.2.x, now it is possible to control the AppBar template or customize the design properties.

AppBar can be enabled on many screens and support many types, such as Text, Icon, Search, Location, Image.

Â 

2. New Design TemplatesğŸ“±

This version adds 6 new templates for the Regular License, bringing the total number of templates for this license to 25.

In addition, there is a wide range of new Attractive Templates available for the Extended License.

Â 

3. New Side Menu âœ¨

A more flexible way to manage the extra menu items from the left side menu:

  • Ability to add New items and drag to reorder the items.
  • Setting theÂ Require LoginÂ menu item (only view after logging in).
  • Viewing the content under the Webview mode.
  • Linking to the Wordpress Blog/Page by ID.
  • Changing the menu Icon from Cupertino or Material collection.
  • Grouping the menu item by using Section Label and Divider or custom color.
Â 

4. New Settings Menu Items ğŸ€

Similar to the Left side menu, you are able to easily manage the menu items on the Settings screen (Profile). Quickly change the Drawer icon for Side menu button on Profile page.

Â 

5. New Product Horizontal Settings ğŸ’¥

Amazing! You now are able to customize the Product Card View and control the design by using superpower options:

  • New Rows configuration & Horizontal Options to control the Spacing, Image Ratio.
  • Allow to showÂ Cart QuantityÂ andÂ Add To CartÂ buttons (-/+).
  • Change the Cart Icon Color with the primary Color & Border-radius.
  • Variant or Booking Products can be quickly added to cart from the Product List by using theÂ Cart Button SheetÂ option.
  • New Background behind the Product List and more design options.
Â 

6. Many Improvements and updatesâš¡ï¸

  • Support to upload the Logo Dart/Light theme from the Features Config.
  • Allow updating the Splash screen.
  • Enable/disable the TabBar.
  • Support to preview the Webview that limit from previous 1.2.x
  • Support the translucent Side menu.
  • Compatible with macOS System Theme.
  • The latest User Guide on FluxBuilder.
Â 

What is next coming?

Our team is working as hard as possible to upgrade the FluxBuilder more stable and powerful. There are some next important milestones that will be coming soon:

  • Release the stableÂ Web version.
  • Release theÂ Mobile versionÂ that supports Real-Time Preview.
  • Release theÂ Build on CloudÂ to support Windows users can build iOS applications.

Please give some Tap âœ‹ if you like this blog. And donâ€™t forget to Subscribe to ourÂ Youtube ChannelÂ for more tutorial videos. Thank you so much for your contributions to FluxStore and FluxBuilder products so far ğŸ™

Feel free to let us know if you have any queries â¤ï¸

items.title: Announcing FluxStore 2.4.x
items.summary: Amazing release with new bunch of features, compatible with latest Flutter framework (Channel Stable) andÂ FluxBuilderÂ (Flutter App Builder) FluxStore is continuously…
items.content_html:
Amazing release with new bunch of features, compatible with latest Flutter framework (Channel Stable) andÂ FluxBuilderÂ (Flutter App Builder)

1. Whatâ€™s new in FluxStore 2.4.x

FluxStore is continuously upgrading the performance and functionality every day, our mission is to deliver the more awesome apps to support your business, compare with the previousÂ 2.2.x FluxStoreÂ includesÂ +691Â git commits code and following new updates.

ğŸŒŸ NewÂ Audio Player and the PlayListÂ are supported on Blog type to play the mp3 audio file, this is a great feature to support building your own Audio app like Spotify ğŸ¹, we will also upgrade this feature to compatible with the WooCommerce product type to allow the play the product (use for selling audio music app).

ğŸŒŸ NewÂ Category Layout Home widget,Â group the product horizontal by category, it is possible to customize this layout from the FluxBuilder app builder side -Â screenshot

ğŸŒŸ NewÂ Geolocation Store Home widgetÂ (Multi-Vendor), get the nearest store on the home screen.

ğŸŒŸ NewÂ Search and Group product by CategoryÂ on Vendor Store, also update the MStore-API to support the API (Multi-Vendor) â€”Â screenshot

ğŸŒŸ NewÂ Subscription Plans Sign Up featureÂ (Woocommerce or WordPressÂ extended license), compatible withÂ Ultimate Membership Pro.

ğŸŒŸ NewÂ Thai languageÂ ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­, mostÂ FluxStore appsÂ are supporting a total ofÂ 26 native languagesÂ so far. Thank you to FluxStoreâ€™s Customers who have sent us the translation in your native languages, our team really appreciates all your contribution ğŸ‘

ğŸŒŸ NewÂ Delivery Date on the CheckoutÂ screen, this great feature is suitable for the Delivery or Booking app, the feature is available bothÂ WooCommerceÂ &Â ShopifyÂ versions.

â™»ï¸ Update theÂ pedanticÂ toÂ flutter_lints, this is a new recommendation from the Flutter team as it contains more strictly coding rules andÂ identifies possible problems in Dart code.

â™»ï¸ Upgrade the SMS Login process to allow users to input extra information (email, password) after verifying OTP, to enable this option make sure to updateÂ EnableNewSMSLogin: true

â™»ï¸ Support Dynamic link on Product, Category screens (Vendor/Store sharing deep-link will be supported on next release)

â™»ï¸ The splash screen config is migrated toÂ env.dartÂ to support customize from FluxBuilder side â€”Â screenshot

â™»ï¸ There are a lot ofÂ other improvements and updatesÂ are explained from the Changelog, please help to get the detail from the Product Wiki.

InspireUI Product Wiki ğŸ“š

inspireui.notion.site

  • Update all latestÂ pubspec.yamlÂ library.
  • Support changing Privacy, About Us, and add a new general item in the Profile screen.
  • Remove Microphone usage.
  • Add the remove notification number on the app icon for iOS and Android.
  • Fix Side Menu shown on the lower layout at Arabic mode.
  • Fix Chat Notification issue.
  • Update Firebase Remote Config feature and document.
  • Support Webview for Privacy Policies page.
  • Translate delivery order notification.
  • Upgrade banner item to support title and description.
  • Fix Orderâ€™s id is not shown after checkout successfully.
  • Add more Webview Flutter option for Webview checkout feature.
  • Upgrade SmartChat UI to support more chat items, descriptions.
  • Fix the navigate to HomePage or SearchPage from EmptyWishList.
  • Hide the cart icon on the product list, apply coupon and points for a booking product.
  • Fix the incorrect Korean language code, modify AfterShipTracking.
  • Fix Out of stock products can be added to cart.
  • Fix Smart Chat does not load webview.
  • Fix status bar color issue.
Â 
  • Delivery: Fix auto-refresh data when receiving notification for theÂ FluxStore ManagerÂ andÂ Delivery BoyÂ app.
  • Delivery: Update user information onÂ Delivery BoyÂ app.
  • Vendor: Improve reviews screen onÂ FluxStore Multi-VendorÂ (WCFM).
  • Vendor: Add Dokan native manager dashboard.
  • Vendor: Fix Loading product list in a single store.
  • Blog: Fix/blog grid widget.
  • Blog: Image is not clear and unexpected Back icon on List-blog.
  • Blog: Detailed Blog Setting does not display when selecting a blog on List-blog.
  • Opencart: Update to show product options on the Order Detail screen.
  • Shopify: Fix the issue that can not get the product by product id on Shopify framework.
  • Shopify: Fix Dynamic Link feature for Shopify framework.
  • Shopify: Fix input Coupon cart Shopify
  • Shopify: Fix can add over an available quantity of a product.
  • Prestashop: Update the Hide the out-of-stock product feature.
  • Magento: Update to load countries and attributes in the background.
Â 

2. FluxBuilder 1.3.x

The new FluxStore release is still working fine with the previousÂ FluxBuilder 1.2.x.Â However, it is not stopping our team from working hard to release a new FluxBuilder 1.3 (will coming soon) with more cool features.

  • ğŸŒŸ Web PWA version is released as standalone and embed iframe under plugins/extensions on your website, support to build APK testing on Cloud within 1 minute (coming soon).
  • ğŸŒŸ New Desktop version with more powerful features, support Windows users to build an iOS app on Cloud, and a bunch of new Design templates.

3. More reference

Below is new resources links that you may really be interested ğŸ‘

items.title: Announcing FluxStore 2.2.x
items.summary: Compatible with Flutter 2.2 and support Null-safety Hello again from InspireUI team!ğŸ‘‹ This is a new changelog for the latest…
items.content_html:
Compatible with Flutter 2.2 and support Null-safety

Hello again from InspireUI team!ğŸ‘‹ This is a new changelog for the latest releasedÂ FluxStore apps. After few months of hard working, we have migrated the library and source code to supportÂ Null-Safety, which is officially required from Flutter 2.2. We will keep the blog post as short as possible. Letâ€™s goğŸ„â€â™€ï¸

Â 

What is the mission of FluxStore apps?

InspireUI Team commit to deliver the best e-commerce Flutter apps to our Customers. Help to save their time and worthÂ +100.000USDÂ just by spendingÂ 59USD ğŸ‘

We would like to thank all of our Customers who trust in usingÂ FluxStore appsÂ for several e-commerce projectsâ¤ï¸. Here is some interesting fact that we archived so far:

1. FluxStore AppsÂ are built withÂ +4,500Â commits,Â +700Â merged requests, and the source code is well maintenance and bug fixing every days â™»ï¸

2. FluxStore appsÂ not only have unlimitedÂ Design Layouts â˜€ï¸but you could also make your own designs. There areÂ Rich and Stable E-Commerce Functionalities ğŸ“¦Â that you could use for multi-purpose projects.

3. FluxStore AppsÂ also come with the freeÂ FluxBuilder Desktop Builder AppÂ (â¬‡ï¸Â Download) to help easily customize and build the app on AppStores without touching the source code.

Whatâ€™s new?

Please be noticed that this is a big release and breaking change of code structure to adapt well with theÂ Flutter 2.2 Null-safety.

If you have customized some modules on the previous version, it requires some effortÂ to do the migrationÂ as well. But if you only update the configÂ env.dartÂ or JSON file, that would be fine and no need to do the migration.

Here is the list of the main updates:

  • ğŸš€ All the FluxStore source code is migrated to Null-safety.
  • ğŸš€ Update all the dependencies to the latest version and also migrate all to Null-safety, we also remove the override dependencies warning.
  • ğŸ‰ Add App Tracking Transparency for iOS 14.5
  • ğŸ‰ Add new style forÂ TabbarÂ -Â image
  • ğŸ‰ Add Order History for Guest (not login) users.
  • â™»ï¸ Upgrade the source to compatibility with the newÂ FluxBuilder 1.2.x
  • â™»ï¸ Upgrade build.grade (minSdkVersion 20, gradle-6.7).
  • â™»ï¸ Update more strictly Analyze rule and pedantic 1.11 -Â image
  • â™»ï¸ Improve overall performance and splash screen loading.
  • â™»ï¸ Upgrade break change from Google Mobile Ads 0.13.0
  • ğŸ©¹ And also include some important bugs fix & improvements,Â see detail

Migration to FluxStore 2.2

  • If you would like to keep the previous FluxStore version (2.1 or 2.0), it is possible to downgrade theÂ Flutter to 2.0.6Â (released on 01/05/2021)
flutter downgrade
(select y)
flutter doctor
  • If using the latestÂ FluxStore 2.2,Â it is required to update your Development Environment to the latestÂ Flutter Stable channel 2.2.xÂ (released on 19/05/2021)
flutter channel stable 
flutter upgrade --force
  • Download the latest FluxStore 2.2 from theÂ download pageÂ or from privateÂ sharing Gitlab, override your existingÂ lib/configÂ folder to the new FluxStore 2.2.
  • Copy the ServerConfig section to newÂ lib/env.dartÂ file, if you have customized other sections, try to compare and copy each section manually instead of overriding the whole file (as the latest version could have some new config options)
  • To apply the new custom Tabbar, go toÂ lib/menu/maintab.dartÂ and uncomment the customerTabbar() function, it could be replace by other type:Â customerTabbar1(), customerTabbar2() and customerTabbar3().Â This feature will be available in the next FluxBuilder release as well, please stay tuned ğŸ‘
  • âš ï¸ Please notice: the latest release is not compatible with the previous FluxStore project as all the files are migrated toÂ Null-safety.
  • âœ… We recommend changing the green files and folders as the below map (common, config, l10n, env.dartÂ files) to keep the project being compatible well with other next coming releases.

What is next coming?

  • âŒ¨ï¸ New Delivery app will be available soon.
  • âŒ¨ï¸ A new bunch of new Premade Templates will be improved.
  • âŒ¨ï¸ We will support the Windows Users to build iOS apps via FluxBuilder.
  • âŒ¨ï¸ Keep upgrading FluxStore to be more stable and faster.
  • âŒ¨ï¸ Subscribe to follow next updates:Â Facebook,Â Twitter,Â Youtube
  • âŒ¨ï¸ Also, donâ€™t forget to give us some Clap for this post ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘

items.title: Setup Facebook Login for Flutter apps
items.summary: Greeting from InspireUI, this is the detailed guide to clarify detail guidelines to set up the Facebook login forÂ the Fluxstore…
items.content_html:
Greeting from InspireUI, this is the detailed guide to clarify detail guidelines to set up the Facebook login forÂ the Fluxstore Projects, you could use as a reference to apply for other Flutter App.

1. Video guide

This blog comes with a detailed video guideline on ourÂ Youtube Channel, you could skip the video by jumping to the next Step By Step topic ğŸ˜Š

2. Setup for IOS

Step 1: OpenÂ https://developers.facebook.comÂ and create your application

Step 2: Once you have created the application, start adding the Facebook Login project.

Step 3: Select the IOS platform

Step 4: Start the IOS platform setup.

  • In this step, we click next to skip
  • we enter the Bundle ID of the IOS project.
  • Open fileÂ project.pbxprojÂ in your project flutter atÂ ios/Runner.xcodeproj/project.pbxprojÂ , search with keywordÂ PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIERÂ to get Bundle ID
  • Return to the developer facebook page and enter bundle ID.
  • Click the save button and thenÂ button ContinueÂ to continue
  • At step 3 click next to continue
  • In step 4, copy the value in the string tag (as shown below).
  • Open theÂ info.plistÂ file in your project flutter and look for the keywordÂ CFBundleURLSchemesÂ as in the picture and paste the copied value above.
  • Go back to the developer facebook, copy the code in the string tag under the key FacebookAppID
  • Continue to open the info.plist file in your project flutter, find the keywordÂ FacebookAppIDÂ and paste the code you just copied into the string tag as shown below.
  • Okay, now the remaining steps (5, 6, 7, 8, 9) just click next to skip.
  • Complete setup for the IOS platform. Now setup project login.

Step 5: On the left menu, underÂ **Facebook Login**, select Settings. Enter your Valid Oauth Redirect URLs url.

  • You can by pass this step by addingÂ auth / facebookÂ to the end of your website URL (No need to have the pageÂ https://<your-domain.com>/auth/facebook, but it will help by pass through this step.)
  • Then click Save change to save.

Step 6: Next, set up your Facebook Project, in the left menu, select Settings -> Basic.

- Enter the URL Provacy Policy URL and Terms of Service URL
- Choose the Category that suits your application.
- Click Save to save.

Step 7: Finally, activate Development mode for your project.

Step 8: Save info facebook login project

  • Okay, the new Facebook login project creation has been completed.
  • Save App ID and App Secret to provide for your Firebase project.

Step 9: Go back to your Firebase project page, on the left menu, select Authentication -> select Sign-in method -> Facebook

  • Click Enable and enter App ID and App Secret in the previous step saved then click Save to finish.
  • Oke completed the login and Facebook setup steps for IOS. Now run your app and check it out.

2. Setup for Android

Important note:

Because the project is separate between the develop and release, if you are not clear about the problem, you will be mistaken.

  • When you build the debug, the application will retrieve keystore information atÂ **android/key-debug.properties**Â . You can get the SHA1 code from the keystore file in folderÂ **android/app**. In the case of using FluxStore's default keystore, the specific keystore path is
  • android/app/mstore.keystore
  • When you build release, the keystore information will be stored in folderÂ **android/key.properties**. In the case of a build release, please call the build bundle script for the application to obtain the correct keystore.

Command build release android:

sh tools / build-appbundle.sh

In this case, the keystore file will be saved in folderÂ certs/Â of the project. If you build release, please get the SHA1 code of the keystore file at the path (default of FluxStore)

certs/key.jks

Step 1: Open the facebook developer page in the previousÂ Setup for IOSÂ step. On the left menu, select Quickstart -> select Android platform

Step 2: Start the Android platform setup.

  • In this step, click next to continue
  • In the import the Facebook SDK step we also ignore this by clicking next

Step 3: enter the package name of the android application in the project flutter and enter the Default Activity Class Name (it is package name with the MainActivity keyword at the end)

  • Find the Package name by opening your project flutter and looking for fileÂ android/app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml. In the second line of the file, we can easily get the package name.
  • Enter the package name and Default Activity Class Name information, click Save and then Continue
  • In this step, you need to add Release Key Hashes
  • Copy the codeÂ Generating a Release Key HashÂ and return to your project flutter
  • Open the fileÂ android/key-debug.propertiesÂ (in case you are building debug) orÂ file android/key.propertiesÂ (In case you are building release) to get information about the keystore.
  • Edit the code copied in the previous stepÂ keytool -exportcert -alias <name_alias> -keystore <path_of_file_keystore> | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64
// Build Debug
keytool -exportcert -alias mstoreapp -keystore android/app/mstoreapp.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64// Build Release
keytool -exportcert -alias key -keystore certs/key.jks| openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64

(This script is demo on MacOS, on Android please try the similar script from the Facebook Guide)

  • Once completed, copy the generated code and return to the Developer Facebook page
  • Enter the code, press save and then continue
  • Click Next to skip this step
  • In this step, you copy the following 2 codes and paste them into the fileÂ android/app/src /main/res/values/strings.xmlÂ instead of the old code.
  • Next steps click next to continue.
  • Complete the setup process for android. Now build the app and test it.

4. Distinguish the difference between all Fluxstore apps:

  1. FluxStore Pro: this is a multi-purpose Flutter app compatible with all Woocommerce, Opencart 3.x, or Magento 2.x websites. If you have already released the website or setup new sites, this product is suitable for your requirements.
  2. FluxStore Multi Vendor: use this app to build your own marketplace like Amazon, Alibabaâ€¦ This app is compatible with Woocommerce website and requires to install Dokan or WCFM plugin.
  3. FluxStore WooCommerce: the features are same with FluxStore Pro, but only focus compatible with any WooCommerce websites.
  4. FluxNews: compatible with any Wordpress templates
  5. FluxStore Listing: use to build innovative apps like Airbnb, TripAdvisor, Yelp or FourSquare. This app requires to install one of following WooCommerce templates:Â Listeo,Â ListingPro, orÂ MyListing
  6. FluxStore Shopify: compatible with any Shopify stores

items.title: Announcing FluxBuilder 1.2.x
items.summary: This is new amazing improvement of the Flutter App Builder -Â FluxBuilder Last updated on April 15th, 2021 â€”Â Change Log NEW…
items.content_html:
This is new amazing improvement of the Flutter App Builder -Â FluxBuilder
Last updated on April 15th, 2021 â€”Â Change Log

NEW FEATURES
(1) New Color Preview & Bulk Designâœ¨
(2) New Real-time Mobile Design Preview ğŸ“²
(3) Add Dynamic screen into Design LayoutğŸš€
(4) New Configure FeaturesğŸ”¥
    Firebase features
    + Firebase SettingğŸ“’
    + Firebase Push NotificationğŸ“¡
    + Dynamic LinkğŸ—¾
    + Firebase Realtime ChatğŸš€(Extended License)
    + Firebase Remote Config ğŸš€(Extended License)
    General Features
    + Loading Iconâ³
    + OnBoarding screenğŸ“±
    + Languages settingsğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦
    + Social LoginğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘¦â€ğŸ‘¦
    + Dark ThemeğŸŒ“
    + OneSignalğŸ””
    + AdvertisementğŸ’°
    + App Ratingâ­ï¸
    + CachingğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»
    + Smart ChatğŸ’¬
    + Product Card CustomizationğŸ“‘
    Checkout & Payments features
    + Shopping CartğŸ›
    + Payment SettingsğŸ’³
    + AfterShip IntegrationğŸ¬
    + Shipping CountryğŸ›µ
    + Webview PaymentğŸ›’
    + CouponğŸ
    + CurrenciesğŸ’µ
    + VendorsğŸ¬(forFluxStore Multi Vendors app)
    + Native RazorpayğŸ’³(Extended License)
    + Native StripeğŸ’³(Extended License)
    + Native PaypalğŸ’³(Extended License)
    + MercadoPago PaymentğŸ’³(Extended License)UPDATE & IMPROVEMENT
    + Update Design TemplatesğŸŠ
    + Brand new design with big UX improvementğŸŠ
    + Bunch of new Design Properties ImprovementğŸŠ
Â 

1. New Color Preview & Bulk Designâœ¨

InspireUI team has constantly updated new stunning Templates for inspiring the customers and giving them an existing source to refer to and apply for their mobile apps.

  • Color Preview: Now it is easy to distinguish items on the Home tab by color. Users easily locate the editing items.
  • Bulk Design: this new feature support to design and custom multi-widget at the same time. What you update is directly reflected in a very intuitive way. We also add more Design Properties for each widget to enhance flexibility ğŸ‘

2. New Real-time Mobile Design Preview ğŸ“²

This feature support previewing the Fluxbuilder App realtime between Mobile Device â†”ï¸ Desktop App (available for Extended License).

Step 1: Follow the instructions to configure and add (or load) any version of Firebase Config (see FluxBuilder Document).

Step 2: After youâ€™ve added (or loaded) Firebase Config successfully, now start using the QR Code creation feature by selectingÂ Advance preview modeÂ and using the Fluxbuilder Mobile app to scan and load the preview on your mobile (ios/android phone).

Step 3: Open FluxBuilder Desktop App and login with your account, open the project you want to scan QR code (Note: This project must be the project for which you have generated a QR code). Then Click the button in the upper left corner â†’ Select the Features tab â†’ In the Features Tab, at the top right corner, select the scan button â†’ start scan the QR code.

Â 

3. Add Dynamic screen into Design LayoutğŸš€

Similar to the dynamic Home screen, this new layout allows to addition multi Dynamic layout to the Tabbar menu.

Â 

4. New Configure FeaturesğŸ”¥

On the new FluxBuilder version 1.2.0, with a Regular license, you are able to customize all common Features ofÂ FluxStore appsÂ on FluxBuilder (exceptÂ FluxStore Manager)

This feature is cover the customization from the small-setting likeÂ Loading IconÂ to the complex feature such asÂ Products Card CustomizeÂ without touching the Config file Flutter source (env.dartÂ file).

Configure FeaturesÂ supported to customize the following options:

  • Basic Settings: Loading Icon, OnBoarding screen, Social Login, OneSignal, Advertisement (Admob, Facebook Ads), App Rating, Set the default Dark Theme, Caching
  • Firebase Settings: config Push Notification, Firebase Remote Config, update Firebase config filesâ€¦
  • Language Management: allow to set the default language, enable visible of Multi-languages(RTL,â€¦).
